titleStmt.title: The Ethiopian eunuchs conuersion. Or, The summe of thirtie sermons vpon part of the eight chapter of the Acts. By Samuel Smith, minister of the word
titleStmt.author: Smith, Samuel, 1588-1665.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Thomas Harper, for Thomas Alchorne, and are to be sold at his shop in Pauls Church-yard, at the signe of the Greene Dragon,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the Cambridge University Library.
